Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if this belongs in this board or in the lounge, but I encountered this video:

http://youtu.be/dq6T5BojXc8

And my first though was that this reminds me of several of my KSP rockets, especially prior to the joint re-inforcement patche.

Heck, I made a rocket the other day with 6 fuel tanks and 3 engines below a tri-coupler and forgot to use struts. It looked pretty similar to this washing machine 30 seconds in, the only difference was that the rocket exploded.

Anyone else reminded of KSP and certain rocket designs?

Note: I apologize that the video is not embedded(assuming you can embed on this forum), I'm on a mobile device and don't have the option.
I imagine my 'planes' would behave sort of like that if/when I install FAR.
The surprising thing is that it held together as long as it did. (Also, moved to the Lounge.)
I'm surprised the belt held out as long as it did. Mine goes out on a slightly unbalanced load.
